# 2004 RTHK Top 10 Gold Songs Awards

The 2004 RTHK Top 10 Gold Songs Awards () was held in 2005 for the 2004 music season.
Top 10 song awards
The top 10 songs (十大中文金曲) of 2003 are as follows. This year only 9 songs were awarded.
